lead_paragraph: SONTAG--Jacob Ross, 19, died January 18, 2016 after a long and difficult battle with Canavan Disease. Son of Richard and Heidi Sontag and Jordana and Gareth Holovach. Brother of Blair and Dean Sontag and Remi and Hailey Holovach. The funeral will be on Thursday, January 21st at 10:00am, Congregation Kol Ami, 252 Soundview Ave., White Plains, NY 10606. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to Blythedale Children's Hospital or Canavan Research Illinois. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SONTAG, JACOB ROSS
